    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

    var userName = g_form.getDisplayValue('user_name');
    var initialName = g_form.getValue('initial_requestor');

    alert(g_form.getUniqueValue('user_name'));
    alert(g_form.getUniqueValue('initial_requestor'));
    if (userName == initialName) {
        alert('Both initial name and user name can not same');
        //	g_form.clearValue('user_name');
        //	g_form.clearValue('initial_requestor');
        return false;
    } else {
        return true;
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-12 05:40:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e52b79742f014110b4c4837cf699b670</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check user Name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e52b79742f014110b4c4837cf699b670</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-14 12:58:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {

          // Add your code here
var app = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
app.addQuery('document_id',current.sys_id);
app.addQuery('state','rejected');
app.query();
if(app.next()) {
template.print(app.comments.getJournalEntry(1));
}
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-14 07:48:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad48a8a52f810110b4c4837cf699b6ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>payment_mail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_ad48a8a52f810110b4c4837cf699b6ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-14 09:01:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
